text1: Ralph is a easy-to-use app that helps you watch over your older or sick pet’s daily life. It tells you how comfortable and happy they are so you can take good care of them.
text2: Ralph will tell you how your pet is doing with a simple score. This helps you see if your pet is feeling good or if they might be in pain or unhappy.
text3: Ralph makes it easier to see if your pet’s health is getting worse, which can help you talk to the vet about what to do next, especially if your pet is very unwell.
